content.p: Students will attend 1 workshop with module convener at the beginning and conduct practical activity throughout the module period. The workshop will include public relations theories, concepts and features of success stories. Practical activity includes spending 3 to 4 hours a week at ADRO office to use office facilities and for guidance/mentoring. The final evaluation will include submitting the log book and presentation to a panel. To apply for this module, e-mail Nur Sharina Baharuddin. By registering to accredit this module you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
